title: Snack Restock Alert!
description: Good news, hackers! We've just restocked Doritos and Red Bull. Fuel up for your coding marathon!

title: Workshop: 'Coding & Snacking 101'
description: Join us in 15 minutes for a quick workshop on maintaining energy levels while coding. We'll cover the best snacks for sustained focus!

title: Team 'Byte Busters' Completed First Milestone
description: Congratulations to Team 'Byte Busters' for completing their first milestone! They've earned a bonus snack pack. Keep up the great work!

title: New Healthy Options Available
description: We've added some brain-boosting snacks to our inventory! Check out the new trail mix and fruit cups for a healthier hacking experience.

title: Midnight Snack Run Scheduled
description: Heads up, night owls! We're organizing a midnight snack run to the local convenience store. Meet at the lobby at 12 AM if you want to join!
